name: PuzzyDice
description:
PuzzyDice is a puzzle game where you must roll the dice to a specific location and find the path leading you to the correct value on the top face. 

The minimal amount of moves is shown for each level so that you can try to optimize if you feel so :)

I would have loved to make more levels, but this is all the time I have for now. Maybe I'll come back to this project later.

It has been done in less than two days for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. The theme was: "Roll of the Dice".

Controls

  • WASD - Move the dice from case to case
  • R - Reset the current level
  • SPACE - Allow fast-forwarding to the next level if you don't feel like waiting

Credits

  • The music must be credited to Crowander from his album "Peaceful", tracks are "Seek And Hide",  "Lighter", and "Dreaming in a Dream". Found on Free Music Archive.
